performance_metrics.name: Compliance Rate (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of regulatory checks and requirements met within a defined timeframe (typically monthly or quarterly). Targets at 98% represent a robust system, while 99.5% indicates near-perfect adherence.

performance_metrics.name: Verification Cycle Time (Hours/Check)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken to verify a single compliance requirement. Lower values indicate greater efficiency. This includes data collection, analysis, and report generation.

performance_metrics.name: Data Accuracy (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of accurate data captured and maintained within the system. Data integrity is critical for reliable reporting and decision-making.

performance_metrics.name: Reporting Latency (Hours/Report)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to generate and distribute compliance reports to stakeholders. Real-time or near real-time reporting is ideal for critical regulations.

performance_metrics.name: Exception Rate (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of instances where a compliance requirement is not met, requiring investigation and corrective action. Lower rates signify effective preventative measures.

implementation_requirements.name: Data Integration
implementation_requirements.specification: Seamless integration with existing ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), CRM (Customer Relationship Management), and MES (Manufacturing Execution System) systems via APIs (Application Programming Interfaces). Supports HL7, FHIR, and other relevant data exchange standards.
implementation_requirements.description: Crucial for automated data retrieval and elimination of manual data entry.

implementation_requirements.name: Workflow Automation
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated workflows for compliance checks, notifications, and approvals. Supports parallel processing and conditional routing based on rule sets.
implementation_requirements.description: Reduces manual intervention and accelerates the compliance process.

implementation_requirements.name: Rule Engine Configuration
implementation_requirements.specification: A configurable rule engine capable of defining compliance requirements, thresholds, and actions. Supports both declarative and procedural rule definition.
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for easy adaptation to changing regulations and business needs.

implementation_requirements.name: Audit Trail & Reporting
implementation_requirements.specification: Comprehensive audit trail capturing all system activity, including user actions, data changes, and rule execution. Supports customizable reporting dashboards and ad-hoc report generation.
implementation_requirements.description: Essential for regulatory compliance and internal controls.

implementation_requirements.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
implementation_requirements.specification: RBAC system allowing granular control over user access to data and functionality based on defined roles and responsibilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Scalability & Performance
implementation_requirements.specification: System architecture designed to handle at least 10,000 active compliance checks concurrently. Server capacity requirement: minimum 64GB RAM, 1TB SSD storage.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures the system can meet current and future needs.

User Training: Comprehensive training programs for all users on system operation and compliance requirements.
Data Governance Policy: Establish a formal data governance policy to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.
Change Management Process: Implement a robust change management process to manage updates and modifications to the system.
Continuous Monitoring: Ongoing monitoring of system performance and compliance metrics.
Cybersecurity Risk Assessment: Periodic assessment of cybersecurity risks and implementation of appropriate security controls.
